PrecisAppointment of LLOYD I. BERLINER of Truro, in the Province of Nova Scotia, Barrister-at-law, to be a Judge of the Supreme Court of Nova Scotia (Family Division), and a Judge ex officio of the Nova Scotia Court of Appeal.
